at.mukprojects.imageloader.image

Class ImageList

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.mukprojects.imageloader.image.ImageList

  • public class ImageList
extends Object
    The ImageList holds all loaded images.
    Author:
    Mathias Markl

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageList()
      Constructs a new ImageList.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addImage(Image img)
      Adds an image to the list.
      void clearList()
      Clears the list.
      Collection<Image> getCopyList()
      Returns a copy of the image list.
      Enumeration<String> getIds()
      Returns a list of all available image identifiers.
      Image getImage(int index)
      Gets the image of the given index or null if the index has no image.

      Returns the image with a given identifier.

      Gets the most recent image.

      Gets a random image from the list.

      Returns the number of key-value mappings in this list.

    • Method Detail

      • clearList

        public void clearList()
        Clears the list.

      • addImage

        public void addImage(Image img)
        Adds an image to the list. If the list already has an image with the same id, the image won't be added.
        Parameters:
        img - The image, which should be added to the list.

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns the number of key-value mappings in this list.
        Returns:
        The size of the list.

      • getIds

        public Enumeration<String> getIds()
        Returns a list of all available image identifiers.
        Returns:
        A list of all image identifiers.

      • getCopyList

        public Collection<Image> getCopyList()
        Returns a copy of the image list.
        Returns:
        A copy of the list.

      • getImage

        public Image getImage(String key)
        Returns the image with a given identifier.
        Parameters:
        key - The image identifier.
        Returns:
        The image.

      • getRandom

        public Image getRandom()
        Gets a random image from the list.
        Returns:
        A random image.

      • getMostRecentImage

        public Image getMostRecentImage()
        Gets the most recent image.
        Returns:
        The last added image.

      • getImage

        public Image getImage(int index)
        Gets the image of the given index or null if the index has no image.
        Parameters:
        index - The index.
        Returns:
        The image.
